softwares.name: AutoCAD
abilities: Can create 2D drawings such as floor plans, elevations, or sections with precision and accuracy.
Apply standard annotation techniques, including text, dimensions, and hatching, to communicate design intent effectively.
Modify existing drawings using a variety of editing tools and techniques to make revisions and updates to designs.

softwares.name: Adobe Illustrator
abilities: Can create logos and branding materials.
Design illustrations and graphics.
Design user interfaces (UI) for website and mobile apps.

softwares.name: Adobe XD
abilities: Can create vector-based design tools to create graphics and icons for UI.

softwares.name: SketchUP
abilities: Can create 3D models of objects, buildings, and landscapes.
Import and export 3D models, creating animations, and generating 2D drawings.
Enhancing designs and speeding up the modeling process using pre-built 3D models, textures, and materials.

softwares.name: ASDIP Foundation
abilities: Can determine appropriate foundation types, such as a spread footing, combined footing, or pile foundation based on soil parameters and loads
Design the foundation to meet the required strength and serviceability criteria.

softwares.name: ETABS
abilities: RCC & steel Structural analysis & design.
RCC & steel Retrofit analysis & design.

softwares.name: Plaxis 2D
abilities: Can define models, and boundary conditions to analyze and determine the system's response to stress, strains, and displacements.
Design piles and foundations.
Investigate and solve geotechnical problems such as slope stability, settlement, or liquefaction.

softwares.name: SWMM
abilities: Can create models by defining the layout & geometry of the system including pipes, channels, and storage facilities.
Simulate storm events and analyzing the behavior of the system.

softwares.name: PTV Vissim
abilities: Can create a traffic network and defining traffic demand.
Simulate and optimize traffic flow.

softwares.name: Adobe Premiere Pro
abilities: Cinematography and travel video contents.
Use color grading, audio mixing, and special effects to enhance the overall quality and impact of videos.

softwares.name: Adobe Photoshop
abilities: Can edit photos using advanced layer masks, and smart objects.
Color correction and color grading.

softwares.name: Adobe Lightroom
abilities: Enhancing photos for print, web, or for social media.

softwares.name: MS Word, MS PowerPoint, MS Excel
abilities: Can create documents, spreadsheets, and presentations.
Use advanced features, such as macros and automation.
